name: Bolls - Bend your Mind
description:
Now Play on Android !

Brief Description
Bolls is a fun and relaxing isometric puzzle game ! 
Work your brain by finding solutions to mind bending Puzzles.
And, Collect all the Stars, if you can !
The Hater Bolls might try and stop you, Shake 'em away ! 

Desktop Controls:
Use WASD to move around.
Press "Space" to stop moving.
Press "Left Shift" to turn the camera around.

Mobile Controls:
Touch anywhere to stop moving.
Swipe to turn the camera around

Game Features:
- Mind Bending Puzzles
- Challenging Gameplay
- Free to Play

Platforms:

- Mac
- Android
- Windows (Future)
- iOS (Future)

Note:
The Windows and iOS versions will be released soon.

Please support the game if you like it, so I can continue building more content and more Games!
